An online portal for sharing research and development projects, tools, and technologies being created at the Tufts CEEO

Search

Welcome to the CEEO

The Tufts Center for Engineering Education (CEEO) is dedicated to improving education through engineering (and vice versa). Our work spans a variety of disciplines from collaborating with Lego Robotics to designing Makerspaces to bringing technology into K-12 classrooms. CEEO Innovations is a database for the many projects and innovations going on at the center.

About the CEEO

Spike Prime Pet helper /projects/DrEsPethelperchallenge.html Spike Prime 2020-07-24 23:08:35 -0700

Pet helper

CEEO INNOVATIONS

This project was created to help specifically a dog. This robot was designed to sense the dog when it is atc10cm away from the sensor. Then the robot was designed to push forward the bowl it had.
